Package com.rexsl.maven.utils

Supplementary utils.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BindingBuilder
    Builder of binding for GroovyExecutor.
    EmbeddedContainer
    Start/stop grizzly container.
    FileFinder
    Convenient finder of files by extension in a given directory.
    GroovyExecutor
    Groovy scripts executor.
    LoggingManager
    Logging configuration aware.Manages logging to alternate appenders depending on scope/subscope at runtime.
    PortReserver
    Reservers a new TPC port.
    RuntimeFilter
    Filter used by embedded container in runtime.
    RuntimeListener
    To be executed before all other code.
    RuntimeResponseWrapper
    Runtime wrapper that redirects all the writes to ByteArrayOutputStream.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GroovyException
    Groovy-generated exception.
